page.title: 12Tourism in Edinburgh
page.content: We interviewed tourists on the esplanade of Edinburgh Castle which stands at the top of the Royal Mile. The Royal MIle has a lot of old and famous buildings which depict Edinburgh's{local history.}The tourists came from places like Canada, U.S.A., Australia and Europe to visit the{historic buildings}of Edinburgh. Many of these countries have very little history of their own. {Tourism}is very important to Edinburgh's economy. Many{events}are put on for the benefit of the tourists. Each year on the Castle Esplanade the military tattoo takes place. This includes demonstrations and displays by the {Armed Forces.} Other tourist attractions include the Festival and the Fringe, museums, perormances in Princes St. Gardens,art galleries, etc.
